Package com.example.project_3

Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.example.project_3.Event
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Event extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an event with various details.

    • Event

      public Event(String name, String date, String time, String location, String details, boolean reuse, String image, String qrCode, String qrPromoCode, String link, ArrayList<Map<String,Object>> announcementss)
      Constructs an event with specified details.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the event.
      date - The date of the event.
      time - The time of the event.
      location - The location of the event.
      details - Details of the event.
      reuse - Whether the event can be reused.
      image - The image associated with the event.
      qrCode - The QR code associated with the event.
      qrPromoCode - The Promo QR Code associated with the event.
      link - The link associated with the event.
      announcementss - The announcements associated with the event.
